posts.name: Jessica Smith
posts.cooked:
Welcome to the Weekly Roundup!

3/06/23- 3/12/23
Issue - V142
Current Release: 1.20.0

Every week we’ll share community-driven apps and articles that were shared with us during the previous week as well as any major announcements from Streamlit. If there is anything we missed feel free to add it in a comment or @ us on Twitter!

  • = articles
  • = videos
  • = apps
  • = components

Updates

  • Come join us! The Streamlit data science team is hiring a new manager.
  • #30DaysofStreamlit is now available in Hindi.
  • Learn from @sebastiandres how to build a search engine app using Streamlit, pandas, and Google Sheets database—the use cases are endless.
  • Interested in joining a hackathon? The @dataprofessor shares how to get started, and tips for a successful experience!

Featured Content

  • GPT Lab
  • Monitoring Sea Surface Temperature at the global level with GEE
  • Salesy - The Product Copy Assistant
